channel.title: Math on Waugh Blog - Miles Waugh
channel.description: Recent content in Math on Waugh Blog - Miles Waugh

item.title: Efficiently Computing Infinite Tetration
item.description: I analyze the infinite tetration (or “power tower”) and derive efficient methods for computing it.

item.title: Complex Fractals in Desmos
item.description: I introduce Newton’s method, Newton fractals, and Desmos’s “complex mode.”
